channel.title: WHy is MoparScape website not working?
channel.description:
Now I know this isn't even suppose to be mentioned about but either its my computer not connecting to the site or the website is just going through some difficulties... right now. I can't connect to the site right, but when I do get to it, it just go right back down again! Is anyone else having this problem beside me? Because I'm unaware of this at the moment...
The connection has timed out The server at www.moparisthebest.com is taking too long to respond. * The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments. * If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer's network connection. * If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the Web.

item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:11, topic:184441”][quote author=Hiaburi link=topic=246115.msg2074746#msg2074746 date=1203933838]
Mitb are you the only one that works on blocking them? Or do you have people helping you out?
[/quote]

I wrote a script that blocks them automatically and set it to run every minute, so I don’t need help. ;D[/quote]
I think i tried that once with something and ended up banning myself a few times…

No problem, happy to help. =p
